StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMIRSReprocessorView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Star.ngRow int, @PageSize int, @SSN varchar(9) = NULL, @Message varchar(100) = NULL, @MessageStatus int = NULL, @MessageEvent int = NULL ) AS
--This will return one more row that they asked for so that they know if there is another page of data. DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @Star.ngRow + @PageSize;
IF @MessageStatus = 0 SET @MessageStatus = NULL IF @MessageEvent = 0 SET @MessageEvent = NULL
DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int NULL, MCRISS_MESSAGE_ID int NULL, PERSON_ID int NULL, NWA_ID int NULL, CONTRACT_ID int NULL, SHIP_ID int NULL, FULL_NAME varchar(100) NULL, SSN varchar(9) NULL, MESSAGE varchar(100) NULL, EVENT varchar(25) NULL, STATUS varchar(25) NULL, ORGANIZATION_ID int NULL, MESSAGE_SENT_BY varchar(15) NULL, MESSAGE_SENT date.me NULL, MESSAGE_PROCESSED date.me NULL, STATUS_TYPE char(1) NULL, STATUS_CODE varchar(10) NULL, DISPOSITION_CODE varchar(20) NULL )
INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), M.MCRISS_MESSAGE_ID, P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, S.SHIP_ID, COALESCE(P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)), SPACE(0)) AS FULL_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, M.MESSAGE, E.EVENT, MS.STATUS, M.ORGANIZATION_ID, M.MESSAGE_SENT_BY, M.MESSAGE_SENT, M.MESSAGE_PROCESSED, CS.STATUS_TYPE, CS.STATUS_CODE, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM MCRISS_MESSAGE M WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS_MESSAGE_EVENT E ON (M.MESSAGE_EVENT = E.MCRISS_MESSAGE_EVENT_ID AND M.MESSAGE = COALESCE(@Message, M.MESSAGE) AND M.MESSAGE_EVENT = COALESCE(@MessageEvent, M.MESSAGE_EVENT)) INNER JOIN MCRISS_MESSAGE_STATUS MS ON (M.MESSAGE_STATUS = MS.MCRISS_MESSAGE_STATUS_ID AND M.MESSAGE_STATUS = COALESCE(@MessageStatus, M.MESSAGE_STATUS)) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON M.MESSAGE = P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = dbo.GetMaxNWAID(P.PERSON_ID)) INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(N.NWA_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SHIPPER S ON C.CONTRACT_ID = S.CONTRACT_ID WHERE @SSN IS NULL OR P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN
SELECT * FROM @Grid WHERE RowNumber >=@Star.ngRow AND RowNumber <=@LastRow ORDER BY RowNumber
SELECT Count(*) AS [TOTAL] FROM @Grid
